title: How can we add stylish lyrics to a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.increase da sass! Well,if u wanna spice up your song,then adding in some sassy lines would definitely turn up the song's style (depending upon the gene of course) 2. Ditch conventional rhymes We've heard thousands of songs and we've heard the same rhyme schemes in most of them; here-fear,say-stay,etc . In order make your song stand out among others,try puttin in some unconventional rhymes in accordance with the meaning of the song. Ex: oh girl, you're an angel in disguise/sweet summer breeze,thats what you remind me of. 3. urban dictionary! It may be hard to believe,but you can find plethora of phrases here that would actually help you write a good song.

For Hindi songs- Use some Urdu words.Use the situations to depict meaning like Sooraj dooba hai yaaro do ghut nashe k maaro. The time is night and it is not conveyed directly.For English songs- Suffix some adjectives to the nouns like Nights turn to the morning blues.Don't refer to the subject directly. Describe the attributes of the subject.Use more pronouns for people.

You can spice up the lyrics by adding a word or two from different language. Add Urdu /English words in a Hindi song,french words in an English songs. Using slang or well known phrases will also help. Experiment with your choice of words and use same word more than once but with different meaning. I know it's easier said than done but it should help.
